item.description:
HAL KATZMAN and THE KADIMA BAND
OUTDOOR GAZEBO CONCERTS
SUMMER 2008

A message from Hal: "I would love to have you come to any or all of these concerts as these are great chances to hear me in my element as Lead Vocalist! We play a wide range of music, from our specialty, Hebrew and Israeli music, all the way to classic Sinatra, Broadway and great rock and roll. In short, we'll have lots of fun!"

Please come out and support Hal in his only public performances of the year. See you there!


Stoughton July 26 5:00-7:00
Faxon Veterans Memorial Park
84 Park St.( RT 27) across from Stoughton Library

Directions: 128 to 138 South (exit 2- you are technically on Rt93N). At center of town, bear left following signs to 27 South.
The park is two blocks up on right across from library. Park on street.
item.name: Kadima Band Outdoor Concert
